I started off as a self taught developer, making simple web pages using HTML, CSS, and some Javascript. After a few months, I decided to take the next step and become a professional developer by enrolling into a coding bootcamp. Nowadays, the projects I create use the latest and most in demand technologies such as React, Node and SQL.
